isis.stitle: TSI 92-01-01 - Modification To The Vehicle Lifting Bar For Decking and Undecking

subjectgroup.subject: Modification To The Vehicle Lifting Bar For Decking and Undecking

geninfo.para: New bumpers with increased spacing from the mounting surface have been released for 9400 Series vehicles. As a result, the lifting bars will not push in far enough to allow the locking pin to be engaged through the bracket and bars. To correct the condition, it will be necessary to rework the bars ( Figure 1).
To allow the bars to engage further into the bracket, it will be necessary to remove material by milling or grinding the area as illustrated by the arrows in Figure 2.

note.para: Do not use a torch to remove the material.

geninfo.para: When finished, the bars must be free of nicks, sharp edges, burrs or undercuts.
